welcome_h: Advertising leadership, paving the way to success.
welcome_p: With us, every advertising campaign is a path to leadership and boundless success on the internet.
about_p1: We bring new customers to your business through advertising on Google, Facebook, and Instagram.
about_p2: This way, you can focus on what truly matters in your business without worrying about where your next customers will come from.
why_p1: We set specific goals for ourselves and deliver results that speak for themselves.
why_p2: We value your success and put all our efforts into achieving your goal.
why_p3: We illuminate our approach clearly and comprehensibly so that you can monitor every step of our work.
tic_p1: We will increase the number of followers on your TikTok account.
tic_p2: We will attract potential customers through your TikTok profile
tic_p3: We will promote and grow the audience of your TikTok account.
inst_p1: We will analyze the target audience.
inst_p2: We will increase the number of clients.
inst_p4: We will provide daily advertising reports.
inst_p5: We will increase the number of subscribers.
face_p1: In-depth analysis of your target audience on Facebook.
face_p2: We will work on increasing engagement and page visits on Facebook.
face_p3: We will increase the number of inquiries and requests through Facebook.
google_p1: We will analyze the target audience.
google_p3: We will increase the number of inquiries.
you_p1: We will thoroughly study your target audience on YouTube.
you_p2: We will do everything possible to increase traffic to your website through YouTube.
you_p3: We will increase the number of inquiries received through YouTube.
you_p4: We will develop an effective sales funnel through YouTube.
tele_p1: We will increase the number of subscribers.
tele_p2: We will bring in targeted leads.
tele_p3: We will promote and scale your channel.
etaps_p1: Conducting a detailed audit of advertising campaigns or a business analysis during the initial ad launch.
etaps_p2: Developing a strategy based on the data obtained in the first stage and its approval together with you.
etaps_p3: Creating a communication strategy and advertising messages for social media advertising.
etaps_p4: Testing from 3 to 8 hypotheses with different strategies depending on your budget and goals.
etaps_p5: Optimizing the advertising campaign based on the performance of the previous stage.
etaps_p6: Increasing the advertising budget and maintaining ad stability.
